page.title: 17GIPSY LIFE LOWER HEATH
page.content: I am a{traveller}- some people call us{gipsies.}My family,my dad,my Mum, Michelle and Charlie and me live in a {trailer.}It is 24 feet long. It has four wheels and you can tow it with a {van.}It is 8 feet wide. 5 of us live in it. My mum cooks in a{microwave {oven}and my mum takes the washing to the{laundrette.}We get our{water}from the tap.We use the{toilet}on the camp. We plug in the{electricity.}When we go on a camp I put the jacks up.In the winter we go to{London}about October for{Christmas.}We leave the place in London when the weather gets better. We go to{England, Scotland or Wales so dad can{sell paint}to{farmers. Where ever we stop l go to{school. {I've}been to{thirty schools}all over Britain.I like my life very much.Its fun!
